title: Key fragments
body: Riot why have i not got a key fragment in 3 weeks?{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Because every time you get one it makes it that much harder to get one again per month. AKA, it's already hard to get them, then you get one, then it becomes more hard to get and it stacks up. Also you have to win the be able to get them..  
{{champion:268}}

> [{quoted}](name=Catspeare,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=ANlFF7t8,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-14T10:14:33.774+0000)
>
> Because every time you get one it makes it that much harder to get one again per month. AKA, it's already hard to get them, then you get one, then it becomes more hard to get and it stacks up. Also you have to win the be able to get them..  
> {{champion:268}}

I don't understand.
